In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params P : network -> Type X : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net nwPackets : list packet nwState : name -> electionsData * raft_data H : msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := nwPackets; nwState := nwState |} Unable to unify "refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost ?M12121)" with "P {| nwPackets := map (fun p : packet => {| pSrc := pSrc p; pDst := pDst p; pBody := snd (pBody p) |}) nwPackets; nwState := fun X : name => nwState X |}".
